titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 2646) to provide for the continuation of agricultural programs through fiscal year 2011.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-426, by Mr. Linder.
All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as read.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 147.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 403.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 5/1/2002--Reported to House without amendment. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 2646 (continuation of agricultural programs through FY 2011).
